enchantment.death_knights.decaying.desc: Increases the damage dealt by Unholy and Blood Spell Powers.
enchantment.death_knights.decaying.descr: Increases the damage dealt by Unholy and Blood Spell Powers.
item.death_knights.frost_dk_ring.lore: Born of death and cold, no one knows where this ancient ring came from.
item.death_knights.frost_dk_necklace.lor: Crafted from the remains of an ancient frozen dragon.
item.death_knights.unholy_dk_ring.lore: Listen closely... hear the pain and suffering of the damned souls within this ring.
item.death_knights.unholy_dk_necklace.lo: Passed by many generations, says to be cursed by the soul of each owner it had.
item.death_knights.blood_dk_ring.lore: The blood of those who used this ring still drips to this day.
item.death_knights.blood_dk_necklace.lor: Forged from the blood of a queen, may hold a curse.
Strike the target with a powerful attack, dealing {damage_1} physical damage and {damage_2} blood damage.
spell.death_knights.death_strike.name: Death Strike
spell.death_knights.death_strike.descrip: Strike the target with a powerful attack, dealing {damage_1} physical damage and {damage_2} blood damage. You heal 10% of your maximum health, if you are already at maximum health, you get an absorption equivalent to 10% of your max health.
spell.death_knights.blood_boil.name: Blood Boil
spell.death_knights.blood_boil.descripti: Boil the blood of all enemies within 8 blocks, dealing {damage} blood damage and applying Blood Plague, dealing constant damage per second.
spell.death_knights.marrowrend.name: Marrowrend
spell.death_knights.marrowrend.descripti: Rend the target, dealing {damage_1} physical damage and {damage_2} blood damage. Applies 3 stacks of Resistance to the caster, taking damage will reduce a stack. The stacks can go up to 4.
spell.death_knights.dark_command.name: Dark Command
spell.death_knights.dark_command.descrip: Shout to command the target and enrage it, forcing it to attack you. Enraged enemies deal 20% less damage.
spell.death_knights.lesser_festering_str: Strike the target with a festering attack, dealing {damage_1} physical damage and {damage_2} unholy damage.
spell.death_knights.festering_strike.des: Strike the target with a festering attack, dealing {damage_1} physical damage and {damage_2} unholy damage. Applies two stacks of a random disease to the target if they have no active disease, or increases the stacks of the active disease by 2.
spell.death_knights.death_coil.name: Death Coil
spell.death_knights.death_coil.descripti: Unleash a coil of death, dealing {damage} unholy damage to the target. If the target is affected by a disease, it will explode up to 4 stacks and apply a single stack of that disease to nearby non-infected targets.
spell.death_knights.epidemic.name: Epidemic
spell.death_knights.epidemic.description: Explode up to 2 stacks of an active disease of all nearby targets, and deal unholy damage per stack to each affected target.
spell.death_knights.death_grip.name: Death Grip
spell.death_knights.death_grip.descripti: Grip the target with the power of death, pulling them towards you, and giving them slowness.
spell.death_knights.lesser_obliterate.de: Strikes a powerful attack against the target, dealing {damage_1} physical damage and {damage_2} frost damage.
spell.death_knights.obliterate.name: Obliterate
spell.death_knights.obliterate.descripti: Strikes a powerful attack against the target, dealing {damage_1} physical damage and {damage_2} frost damage. Applies freezing to the target for 2 seconds and extends the duration of Remorseless Winter and Agonizing Breath.
spell.death_knights.frost_strike.name: Frost Strike
spell.death_knights.frost_strike.descrip: Infuse your runeblade with frost, dealing {damage_2} frost damage and {damage_1} physical damage. If the victim is frozen, icicles will be be thrown to all nearby enemies, dealing {damage_2} frost damage.
spell.death_knights.remorseless_winter.d: Surround yourself with a remorseless winter, dealing constant frost damage to all enemies within 8 blocks every second, having a small chance of freezing them for a second every time it deals damage.
spell.death_knights.agonizing_breath.des: Breathe a cone of frost, dealing high frost damage to all enemies in front of you. If no targets are hit, the breath will stop.
effect.death_knights.atrocious_plague.de: Reduces the damage dealt by the target by 10% per stack.
effect.death_knights.grevious_plague.des: Reduces the healing received by the target by 15% per stack.
effect.death_knights.blood_plague.desc: Deals constant damage per second based on the nearest's blood death knight's power.
effect.death_knights.blood_thirst.desc: Bloodlust takes over, allowing to damage nearby enemies affected by Blood Plague.
effect.death_knights.marrowshield.desc: Protected by the bones of the fallen, gaining stacked Resistance lost by getting hit.
effect.death_knights.enraged.desc: Enraged by bloodlust. You deal 20% less damage.
